They try conceal their lifestyle and their ownership of the drag club downstairs when the fiancée and her parents come for dinner. Written by Elisabeth Freeman <freeman-elisabeth@cs.yale.edu>
Keywords: sexual humor, situational comedy, satire, wig, spectacle
Awards: Nominated for 3 Oscars. Another 5 wins & 2 nominations.

Description: Directed by Édouard Molinaro.  With Ugo Tognazzi, Michel Serrault, Claire Maurier, Rémi Laurent. Two gay men living in St. Tropez have their lives turned upside down when the son of one of the men announces he is getting married. They try conceal their lifestyle and their ownership of the drag club downstairs when the fiancée and her parents come for dinner.
